transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji
Executive: Ye customer care se baat kar rahe hain na aap IndiaMART ke se?
Customer: Hanji bataiye.
Customer: Mera naam hai Nangi Industries se baat kar raha hun.
Executive: Han sir bataiye.
Customer: Maine abhi ek plan liya tha maine usse pehle meri baat hui thi ki mere ko account manager Jaipur ka local Ankit Jain chahiye to aap mere ko plan dena otherwise mat dena.
Customer: Ab uske baad koi ladki ladki mere ko account manager diya mere ko chahiye hi nahi wo mera plan execute karke paisa aap refund karwa do.
Customer: Mujhe karna hi nahi IndiaMART ke sath fir kaam.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai. Main ek baar baat kar leti hun us cheez se related aur fir aapko. Han kis se baat karoge agar account manager Ankit Jain rehte to theek hai otherwise mera paisa wapas dalwa dena mujhe nahi karna IndiaMART ke sath kaam.
Customer: Sabse pehle plan lene se pehle local ka hi local ka nahi Ankit Jain chahiye.
Customer: Local bhi nahi chahiye.
Executive: Chahiye.
Customer: Han main usi ke vyavhar usi ke vyavhar se kaam kar raha hun otherwise aap maine Harish ji Soni ko bhi yahi bola tha otherwise mere ko plan nahi chahiye aap cancel karwa dena refund karwa dena mera paisa.
Executive: Done done done sir koi issue nahi hai. Main 10 baar bol chuka hun aapko bataun pehle bataun. Han.
Executive: Okay okay main baat kar leti hun baat karke solution kar dena ya kahin aur number ho to usko phone karna ho mere ko bata do.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aapko kahin call karne ki jarurat nahi hai aapne mujhe bata diya hai main ek baar aap immediate aap confirmation doge agar ki haan sahab aapka manager account manager Ankit Jain rahega approval aayegi mere ispe mail aayegi tab main approval manunga.
Executive: Achcha achcha theek hai aap mujhe thoda time dijiye main just aapko call kar IndiaMART chahiye hi nahi mere ko madam aapko bataun.
Executive: Sir theek hai aap itna pareshan mat hoiye main ek baar confirm jab in logo ko pehle bola gaya ki Ankit Jain account manager chahiye mere ko Jaipur ka tab to mere ko plan matlab kyu de rahe hain ye kyu ye ladki ko bhej ke kyu pagal bana rahe hain.
Executive: Unhone theek hai theek hai theek hai unhone aapse bola tha ki ha Ankit Jain mil jayenge right.
Customer: Maine bola tha khud ko unhone nahi kisi ne nahi bola maine bola hai khud ko ki mere ko Ankit Jain account manager chahiye unhone bola ki ha Ankit Jain hi mil jayega aapko.
Executive: Achcha theek hai.
Customer: Main usi ke vyavhar se kar raha hun mere ko wo ladka theek hai hamare dono ki tuning already meri company chal rahi thi uske to main usko koi ladki ne koi aur.
Executive: Okay sir koi dikkat nahi hai main karwa dungi. Otherwise mera jo paisa hai na aap refund kar do maine recording kar li hai aapki aapko main phone kar diya hun.
Executive: Han han koi dikkat nahi hai sir hamare paas bhi ye recorded hi hai jo bhi hamara discussion hai main ek baar baat kar leti hun already jab plan lene se pehle ye cheez boli hai to iske baad me aisa kyu karte hain ye log.
Executive: Hmm theek hai ji main mere ko thoda time dijiye sir main ek baar na baat kar aap madam mere ko mail mein mail pe confirmation hona chahiye ki aapka account manager Nangi Industries ka Ankit Jain hai.
Executive: Theek hai okay main baat kar leti hun baat karke fir main aapko na call kar dungi. Done done done okay thoda nahi to mera plan execute kar do mujhe nahi lena plan.
Executive: Okay ji okay sir. Shabdon mein main kaam nahi karunga koi dikkat nahi hai mere ko.
Executive: Theek hai ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants Ankit Jain as account manager.

- Wants refund if Ankit Jain is not assigned.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to look into the matter.

- Executive assured to call back with confirmation.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Executive will call back.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, account manager, jaipur
